fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Inspect someone's home CCTV footage and stand guard for any unwanted trespassers, or put on a bulletproof vest.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Anyone who visits your target for the first time will be roleblocked as you will arrest them for trespassing, then promptly set them free at the end of the night. If this is not their first time, you will arrest them, roleblocking them, then execute them for a repeat offense of trespassing. You will not affect astral visits. You may wear a bulletproof vest twice per game.
